name: EarthFacts
0:
”Alexa Ask earth facts to tell me a earth trivia”
”Alexa Ask earth facts to give me some earth information”
”Alexa Ask earth facts to give me a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: earth facts
Developer Terms of Use
des: Know about a few interesting facts about our beautiful planet earth. Just by adding this skill to your Alexa you can learn some interesting facts about earth. You would be really amazed to learn about this facts about earth which you can then share with your friends and probably ask them a quiz to test their knowledge about earth. This could be used as a good learning exercise to teach kids / adults to know more about the place we stay which is billions of years old.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
